metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9843 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The crc32_big function in crc32.c in zlib 1.2.8 might allow context-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors involving big-endian CRC calculation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9843` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.1.3-6
No subscription required

lib32z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2
lib64z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2
libx32z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2
zlib1g - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> since 3.1.3-7, rsync builds with the system zlib

criterions.comment: rsync package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.3-6').
zlib package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.2.11.dfsg-0ubuntu2').
